text: What exactly is this, how have you used it and why? Very thankful if you could explain briefly :pray:
these are the corresponding styles for the drag and drop editor using a more modern flexbox approach instead of the existing float based approach
I’m just trying to find the most optimized and clean way to use the drag and drop sections
Got it, thanks. Just recently started to explore this as well and had a hard time wrapping my head around it. But then again, I’m a newbie.
